entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 06:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: NNE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of freezing rain early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy mixed with freezing rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or ice pellets. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of ice pellets early in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Ice pellets at times mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
